replies.message:
How Bout you fuck off, thinking you can rhyme is considered a crime to the boss! He has no time to suffer from a loss unlike you he has more important things to cross! Your rhyming with one syllable which to him would be described as despicable but at the same time admirable your trying to diss the God! Bitch get OUTTA here this is my world and you ain't in it! I'm on a whole other planet! You can smell the lyrics burning after I've written it! I planned it! I wan it! You were just a little scribble on my pad then I slammed it! Shut! Shit I think my pen just bust now the ink pours out like blood from your guts!..
